summary: No explicit requirements/acceptance criteria were provided beyond the title’s implied logo/profile-photo replacement. The diff does change the hero profile image, but it also introduces broader styling/theme changes that were not requested and conflict with the stated non-goal of not changing section content beyond the logo swap.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad redesign of global styling to a “vibrant psychedelic” theme (color palette, backgrounds, typography animations) beyond a simple profile-photo/logo replacement.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goal indicates no changes beyond the requested logo swap; the diff summary shows extensive global CSS/theme changes unrelated to swapping the profile photo.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/altered Tailwind theme tokens, shadows, radii, and custom animations (e.g., glow shadows, wiggle/bounce-slow) not required for a logo swap.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements requested design-system expansion; changes appear unrelated to replacing the profile-photo/logo asset.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional hero/section visual effects (extra gradients, glow, animated elements) beyond the logo replacement.
hallucinated_features.reason: The requested change is a logo/profile-photo swap; the diff shows additional decorative/animation layers in the hero area.
